import React, { useMemo } from "react"; import { Helmet, HelmetProvider } from "react-helmet-async"; import Header from "../molecules/shared/Header"; import ThemesData from "../../data/Themes_data"; import ThemeRow from "../molecules/themes/ThemeRow"; import CreateButton from "../atoms/Buttons/CreateButton"; const meta = { title: "", meta: [], link: [], style: [], script: [], }; export default function Theme() { const memoizedThemesData = useMemo(() => { return ThemesData; }, []); return ( <>

{memoizedThemesData.map((theme) => ( ))}

); }
